content.title: Enter the Code
content.body:
1. Download the code for email validation from here.
  2. From the upper-left corner of Iris, in the Templates explorer, under Modules, open emailFieldController.js file.
  3. Open and extract the downloaded zip file and copy the code from it.
  4. Replace the existing code in emailFieldController.js file with the copied code.
  5. From the main menu, go to Project, and select Save.
